title: BRONZE 4 LOOKING FOR ROLE ON OCEANIC OPEN TEAM
body:
I main Jungle and Top. But can play any position.
I can play at virtually any time of the day.
My IGN is OMGHOTDOG
Very Hard working and willing to do whatever it takes to make it on a team!
Plz consider me and add me in game! 

See you on the Rift!

OMGHOTDOG
